about_the_game:
Brink of War is a fast-paced and realistic first person shooter (FPS) game. Its realistic graphics, intense and fast combat experience can make everyone feel the excitement of confrontation. In this game, you can team up with friends to fight against enemies and compete for victory.

Realistic visuals: Brink of War utilizes advanced graphics engine technology to present players with a realistic battlefield environment. The terrain, weather, and lighting effects in the game can all provide players with an immersive experience.

Diversified weapons and equipment: The game offers a wide selection of weapons and equipment, including pistols, rifles, sniper rifles, submachine guns, and more. Players can choose suitable weapons and equipment according to their preferences and combat styles, modify firearms to improve various parameters, and dominate the battlefield

Game mode: The game features multiple competitive game modes, such as team death fighting, random weapons, and percentage points, and sets maps with different rhythms. Players can team up with friends to participate in competitions and showcase teamwork and tactical strategies.

Faster paced battles: The game emphasizes a fast-paced and realistic combat experience, where players need to make quick decisions on the battlefield, flexibly use various skills and tactics, and defeat enemies.

https://bfw.framer.ai/

Ranking and Achievement System: The game has a leaderboard where players can compete with other players for honors. Providing players with rich achievements and stimulating their competitive desire.

Regular updates and activities: The development team (i.e. me) will regularly update the game content, introduce new maps, weapons, and modes to keep players fresh at all times. At the same time, various activities will be held within the game to bring more benefits and challenges to players.

In short, Brink of War is an FPS game full of competitive passion and realism, suitable for players who enjoy fast-paced battles and teamwork. In this game, you will experience the fun of fighting alongside friends, challenging yourself, and achieving glory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060(6GB)/AMD RX480 or RX390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: RAM must be 8GB or more

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3800X / Intel Core i7-10700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX2060/AMD RX5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
